title: "Facial recognition measure will soon be on Youngkin's desk"
excerpt: "Governor Glenn Youngkin will soon be considering a bill allowing local police departments to use controversial facial recognition technology. Big Brother is watching you, or at least that's the concern of a bipartisan group of lawmakers who are opposing legislation that would let your local police department use facial recognition technology."
